definition: an associate in an activity or endeavor or sphere of common interest
details:
noun
- an associate in an activity or endeavor or sphere of common interest
= example: an associate in an activity or endeavor or sphere of common interest
= synonyms: cooperator, partner, pardner
- someone who collaborates with an enemy occupying force
= example: someone who collaborates with an enemy occupying force
= synonyms: collaborationist, quisling
- someone who assists in a plot
= example: someone who assists in a plot
= synonyms: confederate
